greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation of the sequence of positive integers at A232561.
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: z = 8; g[1] = {1}; g[2] = {2, 3}; g[n_] := Riffle[g[n - 1] + 1, 3 g[n - 1]]; j[2] = Join[g[1], g[2]]; j[n_] := Join[j[n - 1], g[n]]; g1[n_] := DeleteDuplicates[DeleteCases[g[n], Alternatives @@ j[n - 1]]]; g1[1] = g[1]; g1[2] = g[2]; t = Flatten[Table[g1[n], {n, 1, z}]]  (* A232561 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Nov 26 2013
